rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BIO1011, BIO1022}

description: In this unit we will explore the construction, components and maintenance of the cell, focusing on: the similarities and differences between prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells; the properties and functions of membranes; how cells replicate, die, communicate, and form communities; and how cells are genetically programmed.
